title: Be your own OTA | EcoHotels.com
text_content: Interested in becoming your own OTA? Now it's as easy as filling a form
No need to spend time and resources on building your own OTA. Analysis, Implementation, Maintenance, we do it for you!
Our partnerships give you access to our existing network of more than 100,000 hotels and growing!
By bringing your loyalty members over, you can provide the same rates to them and make profit when they book somewhere else.

title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) for Guests | EcoHotels.com
Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) for Hotels | EcoHotels.com
text_content: Dear hotels, We‚Äôd love to invite you to join our effort to promote a sustainable future. We strive to be a positive change-maker in the travel industry. Our goal is to impact the hospitality industry in a more sustainable direction.
If you are already listed, you can   sign in here

EcoHotels.com is committed to giving back to the environment. For every booking, we support reforestation and plastic clean-ups in Bali with Plastic Exchange. EcoHotels.com aims at being a tool for the sustainability-conscious traveler who values commitment and responsible actions equally to a good experience and a comfortable stay.

We understand that there are various sustainability certifications available, with varying levels of rigor. To assist properties in achieving meaningful certification, we provide guidance and support. EcoHotels.com is dedicated to ensuring that sustainability certifications are accessible, valuable, and impactful for properties striving to make a difference.

Our mission is to change the travel industry and push it in a more sustainable direction. Therefore, we believe that a low commission rate is crucial for hotels to offer lower rates to their guests, thereby allowing them to book more eco-friendly properties.

Travelers are demanding more sustainability in the travel industry, and what better way to highlight your sustainable initiatives than to showcase them to your future guests. We have a large community and would love to showcase your story on our social media.
Send us a mail to Sales@ecohotels.com with "OUR STORY" in the headline.

We believe that tourism, one of the world's largest and fastest-growing industries, has the potential to drive economic growth and provide a positive experience for travelers. To support our hotel properties, we have established a fixed commission rate of 10%.
Our goal is to maximize revenue for our partners, enabling them to continue to improve their operations and provide exceptional service.
We promise never to use google AdWords on your hotel name. We are only seeking to increase your bookings with new guests, and not steal the ones that are already searching for you.
Let's work together to ensure the increased focus on a better future.
The sign-up of your property can be found here: https://admin.ecohotels.com/signup/ It shouldn‚Äôt take more than a few minutes.
When the sign-up is completed, we‚Äôll receive an application. Once the application is accepted, the profile creation process can start.
If any problems should occur during the sign-up phase, please reach out to us on: support@ecohotels.com
After your application has been accepted you can start creating your profile!
Still have questions?
If you still haven‚Äôt found the answer to your question, please reach out to
EcoHotels.com is not responsible for the content of external websites. ¬©  2025  EcoHotels.com
EcoHotels.com is not responsible for the content of external websites. ¬©  2025  EcoHotels.com

EcoHotels.com provides a booking site based on fair principles: low commissions, best practice sharing, and a sense of community ‚Äì ensuring that we can continue to run our properties with passion.

Low Commissions We Only Charge 10%
Increase your Bookings With New Eco-Guests

List your place on EcoHotels.com Dear hotels, We‚Äôd love to invite you to join our effort to promote a sustainable future. We strive to be a positive change-maker in the travel industry. Our goal is to impact the hospitality industry in a more sustainable direction. List Your Place Now If you are already listed, you can   sign in here EcoHotels.com provides a booking site based on fair principles: low commissions, best practice sharing, and a sense of community ‚Äì ensuring that we can continue to run our properties with passion. BEGIN THE CHANGE EcoHotels.com is committed to giving back to the environment. For every booking, we support reforestation and plastic clean-ups in Bali with Plastic Exchange. EcoHotels.com aims at being a tool for the sustainability-conscious traveler who values commitment and responsible actions equally to a good experience and a comfortable stay. CERTIFICATIONS We understand that there are various sustainability certifications available, with varying levels of rigor. To assist properties in achieving meaningful certification, we provide guidance and support. EcoHotels.com is dedicated to ensuring that sustainability certifications are accessible, valuable, and impactful for properties striving to make a difference. LOW COMMISSIONS Our mission is to change the travel industry and push it in a more sustainable direction. Therefore, we believe that a low commission rate is crucial for hotels to offer lower rates to their guests, thereby allowing them to book more eco-friendly properties. Benefits Free Promotion in our Eco-Community Travelers are demanding more sustainability in the travel industry, and what better way to highlight your sustainable initiatives than to showcase them to your future guests. We have a large community and would love to showcase your story on our social media. Send us a mail to Sales@ecohotels.com with "OUR STORY" in the headline. Low Commissions We Only Charge 10% We believe that tourism, one of the world's largest and fastest-growing industries, has the potential to drive economic growth and provide a positive experience for travelers. To support our hotel properties, we have established a fixed commission rate of 10%. Our goal is to maximize revenue for our partners, enabling them to continue to improve their operations and provide exceptional service. Increase your Bookings With New Eco-Guests We promise never to use google AdWords on your hotel name. We are only seeking to increase your bookings with new guests, and not steal the ones that are already searching for you. Let's work together to ensure the increased focus on a better future. How to apply 1. The sign-up of your property can be found here: https://admin.ecohotels.com/signup/ It shouldn‚Äôt take more than a few minutes. 2. When the sign-up is completed, we‚Äôll receive an application. Once the application is accepted, the profile creation process can start. 3. If any problems should occur during the sign-up phase, please reach out to us on: support@ecohotels.com Profile Creation After your application has been accepted you can start creating your profile! Download guide Frequently Asked Questions How does invoices work? EH will invoice the Hotel for commission on a monthly basis normally on the 10th business day in a calendar month for the commission in the preceding calendar month.   Payment of invoices? The commission is due within 14 days after the invoice date. Where applicable the value added tax will be added. What do we charge commisson for? We charge commission of everything sold through our platform. If you have a cancellation policy where there will be a cancellation fee, we will also charge the 10% commission of this cancellation fee as well. The Commission per reservation is equal to the number of nights reserved at the Hotel by the guest, as set or uploaded to EcoHotels.com including VAT, sales taxes and other applicable taxes and also other add-ons ordered on EcoHotels.com (such as breakfasts, meals, bicycle rental, late check-outs/early check-in fees, extra person charges, resort fees, roll-away beds, theater tickets, service fees, etc.). Which rate would we like to receive? Gross rates. How can i register with EcoHotels.com? Fill in the ''Hotel sign up'' form and click on ''send form''. Your hotel will be evaluated for participation. The next step is to sign our hotel agreement and finalise your participation by uploading information on the EcoHotels.com extranet. Are there any charges to register? We do not charge anything to register your hotel with EcoHotels.com. You only pay a commission over the booked room nights for your hotel through EcoHotels.com. How do i update availability, rates and other information? You can update availability and rates online via the EcoHotels.com extranet. Our team will assist you in making changes to content, rates and/or availability of rooms. How do i receive the confirmation for a reservation? You will receive the confirmation by email and in your extranet overview (after a booking is made online). Where and when does the guest pay for his/her invoice? Guarantees, deposits, or pre-payments may be required to reserve a hotel booking in advance of the hotel stay. Guarantee A charge is not made to the credit card. Rather, the card number is held against a cancellation that violates the hotel's cancellation policy. The guest pays at the hotel upon arrival or departure. Deposit Credit Card: A charge is made to the credit card (typically one night's stay). If the booking is cancelled, the deposit is forfeited to the supplier. Pre-payment Requires payment at the time of booking for part or all of the hotel stay at the time of booking. If the booking is cancelled, the amount or availability of a refund varies according to the conditions associated with the specified booking conditions Some hotels do not require a credit card guarantee or deposit. Typically, these hotels will guarantee the room for a specific arrival time, such as 6:00 PM. If the traveller does not check in by the guaranteed time, the room will not be held for them. What can i do to receive more business through EcoHotels.com It is important to offer the best room rates and the best possible availability. Furthermore, having a truthful and informative hotel description including actual photos of your hotel will help us sell your rooms. Our team will support you in getting the best out of the EcoHotels.com website. Still have questions? If you still haven‚Äôt found the answer to your question, please reach out to support@ecohotels.com

title: Terms and Conditions | EcoHotels.com
text_content: These terms and conditions (the ‚ÄúTerms‚Äù), as may be amended from time to time, apply to all services (the ‚ÄúServices‚Äù) made available by Eco Hotels ApS, Denmark, org no. 41291354, Gullfossgade 4, 2300 Copenhagen S (‚ÄúEcoHotels.com‚Äù) online, through mobile devices, by email, or by telephone.
By using Services hereunder using our website www.ecohotels.com or any of our applications through whatever platform and/or by completing a reservation, you agree to the Terms.

This Privacy Policy describes how EcoHotels.com processes your Personal Data. "Personal Data" is any information with which one can, directly or indirectly, identify a physical person. Please read this Privacy Policy carefully to understand how and for what purposes we process your Personal Data. We aim to keep a high level of protection of your integrity. EcoHotels.com mainly processes Personal Data to develop and maintain the services, handle your bookings, improve your experience, and communicate with you.
When you visit and use our website/app, we process personal data about you by using cookies. This data is used to improve our website, and the user experience and to perform customer support.

We also process your personal data when you use functions on our website, such as signing up for our newsletters, sending us data, or requesting information about one or more of our services, when searching for a hotel and when confirming a hotel booking..
The personal data we process are:
We may use your personal data for the following purposes:

We may share the personal data with others, for instance our hotel partners or companies that provide services for hotel partners(e.g. channel managers), in case you make a booking. We do not otherwise share personal data with third parties, except for the requirement to disclose your personal data as required by law when we reasonably believe that disclosure is necessary to protect the rights or property of EcoHotels.com or others when we have reasonable grounds to believe that such rights or property have been or could be affected.

Mobile Apps and Use of Personal data in relation to Social Media: EcoHotels.com may make available mobile applications for download from various mobile application marketplaces. We may also provide social computing tools directly or indirectly to enable online sharing and collaboration among members who have registered to use them. These may include forums, wikis, blogs, and other social media platforms. When downloading and using these applications or registering to use these social computing tools, you may be asked to provide certain personal data. These applications and tools may include privacy statements with specific information about their collection and handling practices. Read those supplemental statements to understand what the tools and applications may do. Any content you post, such as pictures, information, opinions, or any other type of personal data that you make available to other participants on these social platforms or applications, is not subject to this Privacy Policy. Rather, such content is subject to the Terms of Use of those applications or platforms, and any additional guidelines and privacy information provided in relation to their use, as well as the process by which you can remove your content from such tools or get help to do so. Please refer to them to better understand your, ours, and other parties' rights and obligations with regard to such content. You should be aware that the content you post on any such social computing platform may be made broadly available to others.

Hotel Partners: When you enter into a hotel booking, you are entering into an agreement directly with the hotel you book. Such hotels will be data controllers for any information obtained by them connected with your booking. These hotels will have privacy statements with specific information about their collection and handling practices. Read those statements to understand what processing they will perform. They will maybe also rely on their processing of consent or agreement. Any information obtained by the hotels, directly or indirectly, is not subject to this privacy policy.

When you visit our website, the basis for the processing of your personal data is that it is necessary for us in order to pursue our legitimate interests in improving our website and customer experience, cf. Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data (General Data Protection Regulation) which entered into force on 24 May 2016 and will apply from 25 May 2018 (‚ÄúGDPR‚Äù), article 6(1)f.

When we process personal data in order to provide our search and booking services the basis for the processing can be that it is necessary for the performance of a contract where you are a party cf. GDPR Article 6(1)b or is necessary for the purposes of the basis legitimate interest pursued by us in providing our services cf. GDPR Article 6(1)f.

In addition to the above, we may process your personal data for tracking and profiling for purposes of direct marketing, behavioral advertisement, location-based advertising, and/or tracking-based digital market research, or if you subscribe for newsletters and other marketing material. In these cases, the basis for this processing is GDPR, article 6(1)a, or Article 9(1)a.

We do not believe our site is appealing to children, nor are they directed to children under 16. We do not knowingly collect personal data from persons under the age of 16. If you are a parent of a child under 16, and you believe that your child has provided us with information about him or herself, please contact us.

We may transfer your personal data to so-called ‚Äúthird countries‚Äù outside the EU/EEA. However, this is only if you make a booking at one of our hotels in such countries and only to the extent necessary to perform your booking.

Please contact us if you have questions on our use of data processors, engagement of other data controllers, or transfer to third countries, including any requests for documentation of the necessary levels of data protection. Find our contact information at the end of this Privacy Policy.

You have a number of rights regarding personal data relating to you. EcoHotels.com is committed to helping you with exercising your rights as an individual and to do so please Contact Us. These rights include:

We endeavor to protect your personal data and maintain its accuracy and in order to do so we implement reasonable physical, administrative and technical safeguards to protect the personal data submitted to us, both during transmission and once we receive.

We will retain your Personal Data for the period necessary to enable you to use our services, to provide our services to you (including the service of an online user account (if created)), to comply with applicable laws, to resolve disputes with other parties, and otherwise as necessary to allow us to conduct our business, including to detect and prevent fraud or other illegal activities. If you wish to request that we no longer use your personal data, please contact us at support@ecohotels.com. We reserve the right to retain and use your personal data as necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. After this period your personal data will be anonymized and not be accessible.

Unless specifically requested, we ask that you not send us, and you do not disclose, on or through the Services or otherwise to us, any Sensitive Personal Data (e.g., social security number, taxpayer identification number, passport number, driver‚Äôs license number, or another government-issued identification number; financial account number, with or without any code or password that would permit access to the account, credit history; or information on race, religion, ethnicity, sex life or practices or sexual orientation, medical or health information, genetic or biometric information, biometric templates, political or philosophical beliefs, political party or trade union membership, background check information, judicial data such as criminal records, or information on other judicial or administrative proceedings).

Cookies: A cookie is a small text file that is stored on a user's computer for record-keeping purposes. We use cookies on this site. Cookies are typically categorized as "session" cookies or "persistent" cookies. Session cookies help you navigate through the website efficiently, keeping track of your progression from page to page so that you are not asked for information you have already provided during the current visit. Session cookies are stored in temporary memory and erased when the web browser is closed. Persistent cookies, on the other hand, store user preferences for current and successive visits. They are written on your device's hard disk and are still valid when you restart your browser. We use session ID cookies, these cookies are temporary and expire once you close your browser (or once your session ends). We use preferences cookies when you are a registered user and signed in, these cookies allow a website to remember choices you have made in the past, like what language or currency you prefer, or what your user name and password are so you can automatically sign in. If you reject cookies, you may still use our site, but your ability to use some areas of our site, such as contests or surveys, will be limited. Some of our business partners may use cookies on their sites. We have no access to or control over these cookies. This Privacy Policy covers the use of cookies EcoHotels.com only; it does not cover the use of cookies by any advertisers. You can change your choice by amending your browser settings at any time. If you disable cookies that we use, this may impact your user experience.

The EcoHotels.com website may contain links to other sites that are not owned or controlled by EcoHotels.com. Please be aware that EcoHotels.com is not responsible for the privacy practices of such sites. We encourage you to be aware when you leave our site and to read the privacy statements of each and every website that collects personal data. This Privacy Policy applies only to personal data collected by this website.
Changes to this Privacy Policy

We will not reduce your rights under this Privacy Policy without your consent. We reserve, however, the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time, so please review it frequently. If we decide to change our Privacy Policy, we will communicate this on our website, by e-mail, or by other communication means.

If you have a question about this Privacy Policy or our handling of your personal data, or if you no longer wish to receive marketing e-mails from EcoHotels.com, please Contact us at support@ecohotels.com or follow the unsubscribe instructions included in each marketing email.
You have the right to make a complaint at any time to
Datatilsynet Borgergade 28, 5. DK-1300 K√∏benhavn K +45 33 19 32 00 dt@datatilsynet.dk

The   EcoHotels.com   mobile message service (the "Service") is operated by   EcoHotels.com   ("EcoHotels.com", "we", or "us"). Your use of the Service constitutes your agreement to these terms and conditions (‚ÄúMobile Terms‚Äù). We may modify or cancel the Service or any of its features without notice. To the extent permitted by applicable law, we may also modify these Mobile Terms at any time and your continued use of the Service following the effective date of any such changes shall constitute your acceptance of such changes.

By consenting to   EcoHotels.com's   SMS/text messaging service, you agree to receive recurring SMS/text messages from and on behalf of   EcoHotels.com   through your wireless provider to the mobile number you provided, even if your mobile number is registered on any state or federal Do Not Call list. Text messages may be sent using an automatic telephone dialing system or other technology. Service-related messages may include updates, alerts, and information (e.g., order updates, account alerts, etc.). Promotional messages may include promotions, specials, and other marketing offers (e.g., cart reminders).

You understand that you do not have to sign up for this program in order to make any purchases, and your consent is not a condition of any purchase with     EcoHotels.com . Your participation in this program is completely voluntary.

We do not charge for the Service, but you are responsible for all charges and fees associated with text messaging imposed by your wireless provider. Message frequency varies. Message and data rates may apply. Check your mobile plan and contact your wireless provider for details. You are solely responsible for all charges related to SMS/text messages, including charges from your wireless provider.

You may opt-out of the Service at any time. Text the single keyword command STOP to +18333194304 or click the unsubscribe link (where available) in any text message to cancel. You'll receive a one-time opt-out confirmation text message. No further messages will be sent to your mobile device, unless initiated by you. If you have subscribed to other   EcoHotels.com   mobile message programs and wish to cancel, except where applicable law requires otherwise, you will need to opt out separately from those programs by following the instructions provided in their respective mobile terms.

For Service support or assistance, text HELP to +18333194304 or email   support@ecohotels.com . We may change any short code or telephone number we use to operate the Service at any time and will notify you of these changes. You acknowledge that any messages, including any STOP or HELP requests, you send to a short code or telephone number we have changed may not be received and we will not be responsible for honoring requests made in such messages.

The wireless carriers supported by the Service are not liable for delayed or undelivered messages. You agree to provide us with a valid mobile number. If you get a new mobile number, you will need to sign up for the program with your new number.

To the extent permitted by applicable law, you agree that we will not be liable for failed, delayed, or misdirected delivery of any information sent through the Service, any errors in such information, and/or any action you may or may not take in reliance on the information or Service.
We respect your right to privacy. To see how we collect and use your personal information, please see our   Privacy Policy .
Effective Date: April 7, 2025

EcoLoyalty is the official loyalty program of EcoHotels.com ("we," "our," "us"), designed to offer Members ("you," "your") exclusive benefits and tiered discounts based on your continued engagement with our platform.
The loyalty program is owned and operated by EcoHotels.com ApS, Central Business Register no. (CVR-nr.) 41291354, Gullfossgade 4, 2300 K√∏benhavn S, Denmark.
By enrolling, you agree to these Terms & Conditions.
2.1 Membership Duration:
Your membership in the EcoLoyalty Program will remain active unless terminated by you or EcoHotels.com in accordance with these Terms & Conditions. There is no fixed expiration date for membership.
2.2 Hotel Participation (for your awareness):

The EcoLoyalty Program includes a network of participating hotels that have opted in to provide loyalty discounts through our platform. While many hotels participate, not all properties on EcoHotels.com may offer loyalty benefits.
2.3 Age Requirement:
Membership is open to individuals aged 18 or older.
2.4 Account Creation:
To participate in the EcoLoyalty Program, users must create an account on EcoHotels.com. Membership is free and available to individuals aged 18 or older.
2.5 Personal Use:
Membership is personal and non-transferable.
2.6 Consent to Communication:
By enrolling, you agree to receive email communications regarding your membership, including offers and program updates. You may update your preferences or unsubscribe at any time.
3.1 Hotel Opt-in:

Each participating hotel chooses whether to be part of the EcoLoyalty Program and defines the level of discount they offer to loyalty members. Not all hotels on EcoHotels.com may offer loyalty discounts.
3.2 Booking Directly:
Members receive exclusive discounts on accommodations booked directly through EcoHotels.com.
3.3 Tiered Discounts:
The more you book, the greater your discounts become. Benefits may vary based on hotel partners and booking frequency.
3.4 Non-Qualifying Bookings:
Discounts apply only to eligible bookings made directly on EcoHotels.com. Canceled, no-show, or third-party bookings do not count toward your membership status.
4.1 Enrollment:
To participate in the EcoLoyalty Program, users must create an account on EcoHotels.com. Membership is free and available to individuals aged 18 or older.
4.2 Activation:
Once registered, members are automatically eligible to receive loyalty rates and other program benefits when booking directly through EcoHotels.com.
4.3 Earning Benefits:
Discounts are applied based on engagement with the platform. The more you book, the greater your potential discount. Exact discount levels may vary by hotel and are subject to availability.
4.4 Program Access:
Loyalty pricing will be shown to logged-in members only and may not appear for guest users or third-party bookings.
4.5 No Points System:

The EcoLoyalty Program does not currently operate with a points-based structure. Discounts are applied directly at the time of booking. If a points-based model is introduced in the future, all members will be clearly informed in advance through appropriate communication channels.
5.1 Profile Updates:
Members are responsible for keeping their account information up to date.
5.2 Account Security:
Maintain the confidentiality of your login credentials. Notify us immediately of any unauthorized account activity.
5.3 Cancellation:
You may cancel your membership at any time by contacting our support team. Once cancelled, any loyalty benefits or access to special rates will be removed.
6.1 Account Inactivity:
If there is no account activity (e.g., bookings or logins) for 24 months, the account may be deemed inactive, and access to loyalty benefits may be removed.
7.1 Modifications:
We reserve the right to modify or terminate the Program, including these Terms & Conditions, at any time. Significant changes will be communicated via email or through our website.
7.2 Termination:

In the event of Program termination, Members will have a specified period to utilize any remaining benefits before they expire. A minimum of three (3) months' notice will be provided before the program is officially discontinued.
8.1 Data Collection:
We collect and process personal data in accordance with our   Privacy Policy .
8.2 Data Usage:
Personal data is used to manage the Program, process bookings, and communicate offers.
8.3 Third-Party Sharing:
We may share data with partner hotels and service providers as necessary to administer the Program.
9.1 Prohibited Actions:
Members must not misuse the Program, including but not limited to fraudulent activities, selling or transferring benefits, or engaging in behavior detrimental to EcoHotels.com or its partners.
9.2 Consequences:
Violation of these Terms & Conditions may result in account suspension or termination and forfeiture of any benefits.
9.3 Right to Revoke:
EcoHotels.com reserves the right to deny or revoke membership at its sole discretion, including but not limited to violations of these Terms or misuse of the platform.
10.1 Scope:
EcoHotels.com is not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the Program.
10.2 No Warranty:
We make no warranties regarding the quality or availability of rewards or the Program's operation.
11.1 Jurisdiction:
These Terms & Conditions are governed by the laws of Denmark.
11.2 Dispute Resolution:
Any disputes arising from the Program shall be resolved in the courts of Denmark.
For inquiries related to the EcoLoyalty Program, contact our support team at   support@ecohotels.com .

Terms & Conditions   General Terms and conditions - EcoHotels.com These terms and conditions (the ‚ÄúTerms‚Äù), as may be amended from time to time, apply to all services (the ‚ÄúServices‚Äù) made available by Eco Hotels ApS, Denmark, org no. 41291354, Gullfossgade 4, 2300 Copenhagen S (‚ÄúEcoHotels.com‚Äù) online, through mobile devices, by email, or by telephone.   By using Services hereunder using our website www.ecohotels.com or any of our applications through whatever platform and/or by completing a reservation, you agree to the Terms. Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy describes how EcoHotels.com processes your Personal Data. "Personal Data" is any information with which one can, directly or indirectly, identify a physical person. Please read this Privacy Policy carefully to understand how and for what purposes we process your Personal Data. We aim to keep a high level of protection of your integrity. EcoHotels.com mainly processes Personal Data to develop and maintain the services, handle your bookings, improve your experience, and communicate with you.   Collection of Personal Data When you visit and use our website/app, we process personal data about you by using cookies. This data is used to improve our website, and the user experience and to perform customer support.   We also process your personal data when you use functions on our website, such as signing up for our newsletters, sending us data, or requesting information about one or more of our services, when searching for a hotel and when confirming a hotel booking..   The personal data we process are:    IP- Addresses (used in our temporary log files up to 15 days after which these are deleted)     Contact details such as names, e-mail address, telephone number, address, company names, and other identifying information you provide when making your booking (e.g. regarding persons you travel with)     Requests or special needs you add in comments when making a reservation     Information regarding your hotel searches and your hotel bookings via our webpage/app   We may use your personal data for the following purposes:     The processing is necessary in order for us to fulfill our agreement with you. If you make a hotel search or a booking we process personal data in order to be able to provide our services.   Personalising your experience on our website: We may use personal data we collect about you to provide you with a personalized experience on our website, such as providing you with content in which you may be interested and making navigation on our sites easier. Marketing: The personal data you provide to EcoHotels.com, may be used by us for direct marketing purposes. Before we do so, however, we will obtain your specific consent to have your personal data used in this way. You may at any time choose not to receive marketing materials from us by following the unsubscribe instructions included in each e-mail you may receive, by indicating so when we contact you, or by contacting us directly at support@ecohotels.com. Information Sharing and Disclosure: We may share the personal data with others, for instance our hotel partners or companies that provide services for hotel partners(e.g. channel managers), in case you make a booking. We do not otherwise share personal data with third parties, except for the requirement to disclose your personal data as required by law when we reasonably believe that disclosure is necessary to protect the rights or property of EcoHotels.com or others when we have reasonable grounds to believe that such rights or property have been or could be affected. Mobile Apps and Use of Personal data in relation to Social Media: EcoHotels.com may make available mobile applications for download from various mobile application marketplaces. We may also provide social computing tools directly or indirectly to enable online sharing and collaboration among members who have registered to use them. These may include forums, wikis, blogs, and other social media platforms. When downloading and using these applications or registering to use these social computing tools, you may be asked to provide certain personal data. These applications and tools may include privacy statements with specific information about their collection and handling practices. Read those supplemental statements to understand what the tools and applications may do. Any content you post, such as pictures, information, opinions, or any other type of personal data that you make available to other participants on these social platforms or applications, is not subject to this Privacy Policy. Rather, such content is subject to the Terms of Use of those applications or platforms, and any additional guidelines and privacy information provided in relation to their use, as well as the process by which you can remove your content from such tools or get help to do so. Please refer to them to better understand your, ours, and other parties' rights and obligations with regard to such content. You should be aware that the content you post on any such social computing platform may be made broadly available to others.   Hotel Partners: When you enter into a hotel booking, you are entering into an agreement directly with the hotel you book. Such hotels will be data controllers for any information obtained by them connected with your booking. These hotels will have privacy statements with specific information about their collection and handling practices. Read those statements to understand what processing they will perform. They will maybe also rely on their processing of consent or agreement. Any information obtained by the hotels, directly or indirectly, is not subject to this privacy policy.   Legal Basis for Processing of Personal Data: When you visit our website, the basis for the processing of your personal data is that it is necessary for us in order to pursue our legitimate interests in improving our website and customer experience, cf. Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data (General Data Protection Regulation) which entered into force on 24 May 2016 and will apply from 25 May 2018 (‚ÄúGDPR‚Äù), article 6(1)f. When we process personal data in order to provide our search and booking services the basis for the processing can be that it is necessary for the performance of a contract where you are a party cf. GDPR Article 6(1)b or is necessary for the purposes of the basis legitimate interest pursued by us in providing our services cf. GDPR Article 6(1)f. In addition to the above, we may process your personal data for tracking and profiling for purposes of direct marketing, behavioral advertisement, location-based advertising, and/or tracking-based digital market research, or if you subscribe for newsletters and other marketing material. In these cases, the basis for this processing is GDPR, article 6(1)a, or Article 9(1)a. We do not believe our site is appealing to children, nor are they directed to children under 16. We do not knowingly collect personal data from persons under the age of 16. If you are a parent of a child under 16, and you believe that your child has provided us with information about him or herself, please contact us. International Transfers: We may transfer your personal data to so-called ‚Äúthird countries‚Äù outside the EU/EEA. However, this is only if you make a booking at one of our hotels in such countries and only to the extent necessary to perform your booking. Please contact us if you have questions on our use of data processors, engagement of other data controllers, or transfer to third countries, including any requests for documentation of the necessary levels of data protection. Find our contact information at the end of this Privacy Policy.   Your Rights as a Data Subject:     You have a number of rights regarding personal data relating to you. EcoHotels.com is committed to helping you with exercising your rights as an individual and to do so please Contact Us. These rights include:     to know what personal data we process about you, for what purposes we process it, and whether we disclose the data to others;   to rectify your personal data if it is incorrect; in certain cases, to have some or all of your personal data deleted; to transmit or receive the personal data concerning you, which you have provided to us, when the legal basis for the processing is your consent or a contract with you, unless it is a matter covered by the GDPR, article 20(3) or (4) (so-called data portability); in certain cases and on grounds relating to your particular situation, to object at any time to the processing of your personal data;   to withdraw any consent that you have given to the processing of your personal data, without affecting the lawfulness of processing based on consent before its withdrawal;    to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority: or    to not be subject to a decision based solely on automated processing, which produces legal effects concerning you or similarly significantly affecting you, unless the decision is necessary for entering into or performing in accordance with a contract between you and us, or the decision is authorized by Union or Member State law to which we are subject, or the decision is based on your explicit consent.     Information Security and Accuracy     We endeavor to protect your personal data and maintain its accuracy and in order to do so we implement reasonable physical, administrative and technical safeguards to protect the personal data submitted to us, both during transmission and once we receive. Retention We will retain your Personal Data for the period necessary to enable you to use our services, to provide our services to you (including the service of an online user account (if created)), to comply with applicable laws, to resolve disputes with other parties, and otherwise as necessary to allow us to conduct our business, including to detect and prevent fraud or other illegal activities. If you wish to request that we no longer use your personal data, please contact us at support@ecohotels.com. We reserve the right to retain and use your personal data as necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. After this period your personal data will be anonymized and not be accessible. Sensitive Data Unless specifically requested, we ask that you not send us, and you do not disclose, on or through the Services or otherwise to us, any Sensitive Personal Data (e.g., social security number, taxpayer identification number, passport number, driver‚Äôs license number, or another government-issued identification number; financial account number, with or without any code or password that would permit access to the account, credit history; or information on race, religion, ethnicity, sex life or practices or sexual orientation, medical or health information, genetic or biometric information, biometric templates, political or philosophical beliefs, political party or trade union membership, background check information, judicial data such as criminal records, or information on other judicial or administrative proceedings). Cookies Cookies: A cookie is a small text file that is stored on a user's computer for record-keeping purposes. We use cookies on this site. Cookies are typically categorized as "session" cookies or "persistent" cookies. Session cookies help you navigate through the website efficiently, keeping track of your progression from page to page so that you are not asked for information you have already provided during the current visit. Session cookies are stored in temporary memory and erased when the web browser is closed. Persistent cookies, on the other hand, store user preferences for current and successive visits. They are written on your device's hard disk and are still valid when you restart your browser. We use session ID cookies, these cookies are temporary and expire once you close your browser (or once your session ends). We use preferences cookies when you are a registered user and signed in, these cookies allow a website to remember choices you have made in the past, like what language or currency you prefer, or what your user name and password are so you can automatically sign in. If you reject cookies, you may still use our site, but your ability to use some areas of our site, such as contests or surveys, will be limited. Some of our business partners may use cookies on their sites. We have no access to or control over these cookies. This Privacy Policy covers the use of cookies EcoHotels.com only; it does not cover the use of cookies by any advertisers. You can change your choice by amending your browser settings at any time. If you disable cookies that we use, this may impact your user experience. Links to Other Sites The EcoHotels.com website may contain links to other sites that are not owned or controlled by EcoHotels.com. Please be aware that EcoHotels.com is not responsible for the privacy practices of such sites. We encourage you to be aware when you leave our site and to read the privacy statements of each and every website that collects personal data. This Privacy Policy applies only to personal data collected by this website.  Changes to this Privacy Policy    We will not reduce your rights under this Privacy Policy without your consent. We reserve, however, the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time, so please review it frequently. If we decide to change our Privacy Policy, we will communicate this on our website, by e-mail, or by other communication means. We respect your right to privacy. To see how we collect and use your personal information, please see our   Privacy Policy .   EcoLoyalty Program Terms & Conditions   Effective Date: April 7, 2025 1. Introduction EcoLoyalty is the official loyalty program of EcoHotels.com ("we," "our," "us"), designed to offer Members ("you," "your") exclusive benefits and tiered discounts based on your continued engagement with our platform. The loyalty program is owned and operated by EcoHotels.com ApS, Central Business Register no. (CVR-nr.) 41291354, Gullfossgade 4, 2300 K√∏benhavn S, Denmark. By enrolling, you agree to these Terms & Conditions. 2. Membership Eligibility 2.1 Membership Duration: Your membership in the EcoLoyalty Program will remain active unless terminated by you or EcoHotels.com in accordance with these Terms & Conditions. There is no fixed expiration date for membership. 2.2 Hotel Participation (for your awareness): The EcoLoyalty Program includes a network of participating hotels that have opted in to provide loyalty discounts through our platform. While many hotels participate, not all properties on EcoHotels.com may offer loyalty benefits. 2.3 Age Requirement: Membership is open to individuals aged 18 or older. 2.4 Account Creation: To participate in the EcoLoyalty Program, users must create an account on EcoHotels.com. Membership is free and available to individuals aged 18 or older. 2.5 Personal Use: Membership is personal and non-transferable. 2.6 Consent to Communication: By enrolling, you agree to receive email communications regarding your membership, including offers and program updates. You may update your preferences or unsubscribe at any time. 3. Earning Benefits 3.1 Hotel Opt-in: Each participating hotel chooses whether to be part of the EcoLoyalty Program and defines the level of discount they offer to loyalty members. Not all hotels on EcoHotels.com may offer loyalty discounts. 3.2 Booking Directly: Members receive exclusive discounts on accommodations booked directly through EcoHotels.com. 3.3 Tiered Discounts: The more you book, the greater your discounts become. Benefits may vary based on hotel partners and booking frequency. 3.4 Non-Qualifying Bookings: Discounts apply only to eligible bookings made directly on EcoHotels.com. Canceled, no-show, or third-party bookings do not count toward your membership status. 4. How to Participate in the Loyalty Program 4.1 Enrollment: To participate in the EcoLoyalty Program, users must create an account on EcoHotels.com. Membership is free and available to individuals aged 18 or older. 4.2 Activation: Once registered, members are automatically eligible to receive loyalty rates and other program benefits when booking directly through EcoHotels.com. 4.3 Earning Benefits: Discounts are applied based on engagement with the platform. The more you book, the greater your potential discount. Exact discount levels may vary by hotel and are subject to availability. 4.4 Program Access: Loyalty pricing will be shown to logged-in members only and may not appear for guest users or third-party bookings. 4.5 No Points System: The EcoLoyalty Program does not currently operate with a points-based structure. Discounts are applied directly at the time of booking. If a points-based model is introduced in the future, all members will be clearly informed in advance through appropriate communication channels. 5. Account Management 5.1 Profile Updates: Members are responsible for keeping their account information up to date. 5.2 Account Security: Maintain the confidentiality of your login credentials. Notify us immediately of any unauthorized account activity. 5.3 Cancellation: You may cancel your membership at any time by contacting our support team. Once cancelled, any loyalty benefits or access to special rates will be removed. 6. Inactivity and Expiration 6.1 Account Inactivity: If there is no account activity (e.g., bookings or logins) for 24 months, the account may be deemed inactive, and access to loyalty benefits may be removed. 7. Program Modifications and Termination 7.1 Modifications: We reserve the right to modify or terminate the Program, including these Terms & Conditions, at any time. Significant changes will be communicated via email or through our website. 7.2 Termination: In the event of Program termination, Members will have a specified period to utilize any remaining benefits before they expire. A minimum of three (3) months' notice will be provided before the program is officially discontinued. 8. Privacy and Data Protection 8.1 Data Collection: We collect and process personal data in accordance with our   Privacy Policy . 8.2 Data Usage: Personal data is used to manage the Program, process bookings, and communicate offers. 8.3 Third-Party Sharing: We may share data with partner hotels and service providers as necessary to administer the Program. 9. Member Conduct 9.1 Prohibited Actions: Members must not misuse the Program, including but not limited to fraudulent activities, selling or transferring benefits, or engaging in behavior detrimental to EcoHotels.com or its partners. 9.2 Consequences: Violation of these Terms & Conditions may result in account suspension or termination and forfeiture of any benefits. 9.3 Right to Revoke: EcoHotels.com reserves the right to deny or revoke membership at its sole discretion, including but not limited to violations of these Terms or misuse of the platform. 10. Limitation of Liability 10.1 Scope: EcoHotels.com is not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the Program. 10.2 No Warranty: We make no warranties regarding the quality or availability of rewards or the Program's operation. 11. Governing Law 11.1 Jurisdiction: These Terms & Conditions are governed by the laws of Denmark. 11.2 Dispute Resolution: Any disputes arising from the Program shall be resolved in the courts of Denmark. 12. Contact Information For inquiries related to the EcoLoyalty Program, contact our support team at   support@ecohotels.com . By participating in the EcoLoyalty Program, you acknowledge and agree to these Terms & Conditions.
